required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of SHR-1210 in Combination With AIN457 in Patients With MSS CRC（SHR-1210-AIN457）
clinical_study.official_title: Phase Ib/IIa Study of SHR-1210 Combined With AIN457 for Patients With Late Stage MSS CRC Who Failed Second-line and Above Treatment

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a Phase Ib/IIa, Open-label, Investigator-initiated Trail of SHR-1210 (an Anti-PD-1 Inhibitor) in combination with AIN457 for patients with late stage MSS CRC who failed second-line and above treatment.
The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and RD of SHR-1210 combination with AIN457 as a treatment of MSS CRC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the first drug administration to within 90 days for the last SHR-1210 and AIN 457 dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first drug administration up to two years
From the first drug administration up to two years
From the first drug administration up to two years
From the first drug administration up to two years
From the first drug administration up to two years

arm_group.description: SHR-1210 was administered 200mg iv every 2 weeks in combination with AIN457 150mg or 300mg ih every 2 weeks

intervention.description: SHR-1210 was administered 200mg iv every 2 weeks
AIN457 was administered 150mg or 300mg ih every 2 weeks
